title: Augmented Reality (AR)-based Manufacturing Training Design: Laser Cutting Machine Operation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic manufacturing processes and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Practice-centered training to enhance manufacturing technology education competencies for pre-service and in-service teachers.

learning_goals: Learners can perform basic laser cutting machine operation procedures with 80% accuracy using AR simulations.
Learners reduce error rates by 25% compared to traditional training while complying with safety regulations in an AR-supported environment
Learners can explain how to apply AR solutions to real-world manufacturing scenarios through microlearning modules
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
